large.label: Embedded-Large (up to 1000 hosts, 10,000 VMs)
large.description: This will deploy a Large VM configured with 16 vCPUs and 32 GB of memory. Please note this option contains vCenter Server with an embedded infrastructure controller.

medium.label: Embedded-Medium (up to 300 hosts, 6,000 VMs)
medium.description: This will deploy a Medium VM configured with 8 vCPUs and 24 GB of memory. Please note this option contains vCenter Server with an embedded infrastructure controller.

small.label: Embedded-Small (up to 150 hosts, 3,000 VMs)
small.description: This will deploy a Small VM configured with 4 vCPUs and 16 GB of memory. Please note this option contains vCenter Server with an embedded infrastructure controller.

tiny.label: Embedded-Tiny (up to 20 hosts, 400 VMs)
tiny.description: This will deploy a Tiny VM configured with 2 vCPUs and 8 GB of memory. Please note this option contains vCenter Server with an embedded infrastructure controller.

management-large.label: Management-Large (up to 1000 hosts, 10,000 VMs)
management-large.description: This will deploy a Large VM configured with 16 vCPUs and 32 GB of memory. These resources will be used by the vCenter Server services.

management-medium.label: Management-Medium (up to 300 hosts, 6,000 VMs)
management-medium.description: This will deploy a Medium VM configured with 8 vCPUs and 24 GB of memory. These resources will be used by the vCenter Server services.

management-small.label: Management-Small (up to 150 hosts, 3,000 VMs)
management-small.description: This will deploy a Small VM configured with 4 vCPUs and 16 GB of memory. These resources will be used by the vCenter Server services.

management-tiny.label: Management-Tiny (up to 20 hosts, 400 VMs)
management-tiny.description: This will deploy a Tiny VM configured with 2 vCPUs and 8 GB of memory. These resources will be used by the vCenter Server services.

infrastructure.label: Infrastructure Controller
infrastructure.description: This will deploy an external Infrastructure Controller VM with 2 vCPU and 2GB of memory.
